key_takeaways: Solution: Use 5-part story structure: hook, setting, conflict, resolution, call to action (Difficulty: beginner)
Solution: Act more human, provide value instead of selling (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Storytelling-based content creation using narrative arc structure (Channel: content)
Growth Tactic: Multi-step video production process (Channel: content)
Strategy: Focus on storytelling over trends for sustainable audience building
